'''Lumidouce Harbor Type-05 Combine Lifter''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Lumidouce Harbor Type-05 Combine Lifter is obtainable from [[Remarkable Chest]] after completing a [[Water Volume Detection Crystal]] puzzle.

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in [[Erinnyes Forest]].

</gallery>
